item.title: Queenseat
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Queenseat. It’s an expansion / spin-off for the original game Kingseat.

item.title: Smallseat
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Smallseat. While making my game Kingseat and its spin-offs, I realized something.

item.title: Kingseat
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Kingseat. In this article I will guide you through the journey of creating this game, from its inception until its final published product.
